author: Red Means Recording
description:
I will remove this comment when I hear back from them and have confirmed this is fixed, but at the moment of filming this video, there is a bug that creates a 20 millisecond delay through midi clock between the hex drums and the bassline. they are aware of this issue and claim they are working on a fix. I'll remove this comment when it is fixed. 

Let's take a look and listen to the Erica Synths Hexdrums. 

Get this gear and support the channel (affiliate):

title: Banging the Box: Erica Synth Hexdrums Walkthrough and Jam
